import React from 'react'; import './UserManagement.css'; // Import the scoped CSS import AnimatedButton from '../common/AnimatedButton' const UserManagement = ({ users = [] }) => { return (

User Management

NAME
EMAIL
STATUS
MEALS
ACTIONS
{users.map(user => (
{user.name}
{user.email}
{user.status}
{user.meals}
))}
); }; export default UserManagement;
